text: Cregneash is a small village and tourist destination in the very south-west of the Isle of Man. It is about from Port Erin. Most of the village is now part of the Manx National Heritage. There are also a small number of private homes in the village, but they are made to maintain an older traditional look. The village speaks the Manx language. == References == Category:Isle of Man Category:Villages in Europe
title: Cregneash
